query.statement: SELECT (SELECT A.CLS4_NAME FROM MAS_HMR_MAP_CLS4 A, MAS_HMR_MAP B WHERE A.CLS4_CODE = B.CLS4_CODE AND B.MAP_CD = V1.MAP_CD) MAP_CDNM, (SELECT B.UOM_CODE FROM MAS_HMR_MAP_CLS4 A, MAS_HMR_MAP B WHERE A.CLS4_CODE = B.CLS4_CODE AND B.MAP_CD = V1.MAP_CD) UOM_CODE, (SELECT A.CLS3_CODE FROM MAS_HMR_MAP_CLS4 A, MAS_HMR_MAP B WHERE A.CLS4_CODE = B.CLS4_CODE AND B.MAP_CD = V1.MAP_CD) CLS3_CODE, (SELECT CLS3_NAME FROM MAS_HMR_MAP_CLS3 WHERE CLS3_CODE = (SELECT A.CLS3_CODE FROM MAS_HMR_MAP_CLS4 A, MAS_HMR_MAP B WHERE A.CLS4_CODE = B.CLS4_CODE AND B.MAP_CD = V1.MAP_CD)) CLS3_NAME, NVL((SELECT AA.SALE_PRICE FROM MAS_HMR_PRICE AA ,(SELECT E.UPJANG, E.CLS4_CODE, MAX(E.START_DATE) AS START_DATE FROM MAS_HMR_PRICE E WHERE E.START_DATE BETWEEN '19000101' AND #START_DATE# AND E.UPJANG = #UPJANG# GROUP BY E.UPJANG, E.CLS4_CODE) D WHERE AA.UPJANG = D.UPJANG AND AA.CLS4_CODE = D.CLS4_CODE AND AA.START_DATE = D.START_DATE AND AA.CLS4_CODE = V.CLS4_CODE), 0) SALE_PRICE, '100' TAX_KIND, '°ú¼¼' TAX_KINDNM FROM MAS_HMR_MAP_CLS4 V, MAS_HMR_MAP V1 WHERE V.CLS4_CODE = V1.CLS4_CODE AND V1.MAP_CD = #MAP_CD#
